name: Through the Forest
description:
Through the Forest is an action/adventure game created for the #femalelinkjam.

Note: this is the jam version of the game and does not currently have an end state.

Controls (also in game)

Keyboard - Move: WASD or arrows, Action: C or Num5, Run: X or Num6, Pause: P or Escape

Controller - Move: Left stick, Action: A, Run: B, Pause: Start

All programming, art, and sound by James Winkler (uinku).
